If you like porn and gaming, this game is both. This proper shooter porn is exactly what you need to relax at the end of the day. No boring plots or foreplay, just pure shooting orgy with periodic slow-mo cumpilations and blood 'n' s*** all over the place. If you prefer BDSM, choose top difficulty and you're guaranteed to be sliced with chainsaws and then humped dead. To dominate, choosing easier difficulties is recommended.
If you need to recharge your gun, the gun shop lady is always happy to help.
She would frequently remind you that she "likes the big ones", and give discount for higher-level players.
During the orgy you are required to inject yourself with some dope to keep going.
A paramedic class player may even handle a gun to shoot you with a dope syringe.
At the end of every orgy a big insane guy comes into play and intensively tries to **** you up.
Taking him down takes a lot of lube (ammo) and good teamwork.
Summing up, without any doubt , this game is a must have.
Fun game, better with friends ^_^

Great game! Feels like Unreal Tournament, in some ways, but with a horror genre twist to it. The only real downfall I notice is... after each wave (about 30 or so mobs), there's a 1 minute break to buy weapons and ammo. It's not non-stop action, like most FPS games. Other than that, the game is great to play.

Also, there is a wide variety of weapons to choose from. Unlike the ones in Unreal, these are more realistic. You can choose from chainsaws, katanas, axes, AK-47's, rocket launchers, and so many other weapons to choose from.

Zombies! Guns! Cool accents! Great wave gameplay!  It's a pretty well done zombie survival game in first person.  Additional character skins for a bit of variety and achievements for knocking out funny gameplay.  It's pretty good for a try if you have the spare money.

Like Left 4 Dead and Counter-Strike mixed together. While it may lack the diversity of, say, TF2. It's still a very fun game. Get some buddies together, pick a server, pick a class, and let the carnage begin. While it may look like a scary game, it really isn't. It's hard to take the games scary elements seriously when every character you play as has a super-british accent. I AM WEWDING, DIS DOSH.

*you never lose control of your character (pounced/choked/charged)
*it has classes, and experience that persist between servers
*it has currency used to buy new weapons and ammo between rounds
*you can weld doors shut to slow down and direct the flow of the monsters

.....Killing floor is probably one of the simplest games you can buy. It's also probably one of the most fun games you can buy for the price. 
.....And it is, without a doubt, one of the best supported games ever released. The games is 5 years old, and they released new content several times a year every year up until the release of Killing Floor 2! 
.....The new content included new maps, custom weapons, and seasonal zeds. Fully developed content that was complete and stood on it's own. 


.....Basic gameplay:
Choose a class, a difficulty level, and a map.
Spawn into the map with up to five other players. 
Kill zeds to earn cash and survive to the end of each round for bonus cash.
Use the cash between rounds to buy ammo, armor, and better weapons for the next round.
Survive all of the rounds to face the partriarch. 
Kill the patriarch and you've won.
Rinse and repeat.


.....Details:

.....Each class has inherent bonuses when using weapons designed for their class. But everyone can use all weapons, if they can afford them. 

.....Getting kills or killing specific zeds with a certain weapon levels your class. Each class has levels that grant significant bonuses to their roles. Increased ammo capacity, faster reloads, etc.

.....You don't have to be using a certain class to level it. If you chose beserker but find yourself using a commandos weapon, you're still leveling your commando rank. You won't be able to take advantage of the commando bonuses that you've earned until you select the commando class. But this mechanic means that every kill you make is helping to advance your character. Even if you aren't using that specific class at that particular moment.

.....You can change your class and weapon loadout after each round based on your teams needs or the zed type you will be facing the next round.

.....Lots of maps and reasonable achievments give the game lots of replayability. 


.....The negative:

.....It does take quite a while to achieve the highest levels for each class. However, it is very rewarding when you do. And you do not have to grind to achieve them. You simply play.

.....The most diffucult levels, suicidal and hell on earth become monotonous. They are so difficult that your team must select certain classes, follow a certain plan, and act as a cohesive unit to survive. They take a long time to complete, so failing late in a game can be very tiresome.

.....A very few of the achievments either require a significant effort from the entire team or sheer luck to complete. So if your teammates already have them it may be diffcult to get them.
